summary: A simple mod that a unique expert level armor spell to the game.
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod that a unique expert level armor spell to the game.

The spell is similar to Ebonyflesh, but with a few more features. When you cast it, you gain the armor spell, plus some health regen and magicka resisting. You can obtain the spellbook from anyone who sells expert alteration spells, like Tolfdir.

There are two versions: The cheat and the lore-friendly one. ONLY USE ONE.



I recommend using my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92792]ring mod[/url] to go along with this.



[color=red][size=4][b][u]ATTENTION[/u]: [/b][/size][/color]This mod hasn't been tested and I'm unsure if you can get the spell book from merchants. You can always type "help Arxo" in the console and get the spellbook.



[u]Requirements:[/u]
[size=2]- Skyrim

[/size]

This mod should work with everything. There's no reason it shouldn't.

Let me know if there are any problems or if you want me to add anything to the mod.
author: Richard

files.name: Arxo's Armor Spell - Lore Friendly Version
